Rinkside.Description: Seats right next to the action for an unparalleled game experience.
Rinkside.View_Quality: Direct ice-level view, engaging and immersive experience.
Rinkside.Unique_Features: Chance for player interactions, possibility of being seen on TV.
Rinkside.Accessibility: Easy access, but limited space for personal mobility devices.
Rinkside.Special_Perks: Exclusive access to the Platinum Lounge, complimentary dining and beverages.

Club_Seats.Description: Offering a fantastic view of the game from the sides with added benefits.
Club_Seats.View_Quality: Elevated side views with clear line of sight to the ice.
Club_Seats.Unique_Features: Wider seats with more leg room, less crowded sections.
Club_Seats.Accessibility: Dedicated entrance for easier access, nearby elevators.
Club_Seats.Special_Perks: Access to exclusive lounges and in-seat wait service.

Center_Balcony.Description: Great overall view of the game from an elevated position.
Center_Balcony.View_Quality: Panoramic view of the ice, ideal for tactical analysis.
Center_Balcony.Unique_Features: Affordable pricing for a comprehensive view of the action.
Center_Balcony.Accessibility: Accessible seating available, elevators to balcony level.
Center_Balcony.Special_Perks: More budget-friendly option with a full view of the game.

Loge_Level.Description: Just above rink level, offering close views without being on the ice.
Loge_Level.View_Quality: Close to the action with a slightly elevated perspective.
Loge_Level.Unique_Features: Proximity to the ice with a more accessible price point.
Loge_Level.Special_Perks: Good balance of price, view, and experience.

restaurants_bars.name: Dinosaur Bar-B-Que
restaurants_bars.description: A lively biker-themed barbecue joint known for its ribs and brisket, offering a hearty meal before New Jersey Devils games.

restaurants_bars.name: Edison Ale House
restaurants_bars.description: Located just steps from Prudential Center, this pub offers a wide selection of beers and classic American pub fare in a relaxed setting.

restaurants_bars.name: Mercato Tomato Pie
restaurants_bars.description: Serving up classic Newark-style pizza in a casual atmosphere, perfect for a quick bite before heading to the game.

restaurants_bars.name: Hobby's Delicatessen & Restaurant
restaurants_bars.description: An old-school deli offering oversized sandwiches and traditional Jewish fare, a favorite among local and visiting fans alike.

restaurants_bars.name: The Ainsworth Newark
restaurants_bars.description: A upscale sports bar with a comprehensive menu of upscale American cuisine, cocktails, and a lively atmosphere for game nights.

restaurants_bars.name: Hell's Kitchen Lounge
restaurants_bars.description: This kitschy, devil-themed bar offers creative cocktails, pub grub, and a vibrant atmosphere, making it a fun spot for pre or post-game festivities.

accommodations.name: Hotel Indigo Newark Downtown
accommodations.description: Chic hotel in a historic building offering modern rooms, a rooftop bar, and proximity to Prudential Center.

accommodations.name: Courtyard by Marriott Newark Downtown
accommodations.description: Contemporary hotel with comfortable rooms, a fitness center, and easy access to New Jersey Devils games.

accommodations.name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Newark Airport
accommodations.description: Convenient hotel with a shuttle service to Newark Airport, offering dining options and an indoor pool, a short drive from Prudential Center.

accommodations.name: Robert Treat Hotel, BW Premier Collection
accommodations.description: Historic hotel with elegant accommodations, dining options, and event spaces, located close to Prudential Center.

tourist_attractions.name: Newark Museum of Art
tourist_attractions.description: New Jersey's largest museum offering diverse collections of art and natural science exhibits, a must-visit for cultural enthusiasts.

tourist_attractions.name: Branch Brook Park
tourist_attractions.description: Famous for its magnificent cherry blossom trees, this park offers scenic views, walking paths, and recreational activities.

tourist_attractions.name: Liberty State Park
tourist_attractions.address: 200 Morris Pesin Dr, Jersey City, NJ 07305
tourist_attractions.description: Offering stunning views of the Statue of Liberty and Manhattan skyline, this park is ideal for picnics, strolling, and ferry rides to Ellis Island and the Statue of Liberty.

tourist_attractions.name: Prudential Center
tourist_attractions.description: Home of the New Jersey Devils, this arena hosts many sporting events, concerts, and special events throughout the year.

tourist_attractions.name: Thomas Edison National Historical Park
tourist_attractions.description: Explore the home and laboratory of America's greatest inventor, Thomas Edison, and see where he developed many of his significant inventions.

team_related_activities.name: Prudential Center Tours
team_related_activities.description: Experience the Prudential Center, home of the New Jersey Devils. Join guided tours to explore behind-the-scenes areas and learn about the team's history.

team_related_activities.name: Red Bull Arena
team_related_activities.description: While primarily the home of the New York Red Bulls, it's a nearby sports venue offering additional sporting events that might interest visitors.

team_related_activities.name: Jersey Gardens
team_related_activities.description: New Jersey's largest outlet mall offers a shopping experience with over 200 stores, making it a perfect stop for visitors.

options.description: NJ Transit provides direct access to Newark Penn Station, located a short walk from the Prudential Center, with comprehensive service from across New Jersey.
The PATH train offers a convenient route to Newark Penn Station from various parts of New York City, including a direct line from the World Trade Center site.
The Newark Light Rail connects Newark Penn Station to the Prudential Center, offering easy access with stops right in front of the arena.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official New Jersey Devils Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The primary source for all Devils ticket sales, offering guaranteed authenticity and the best selection of seats.

best_places_to_buy.name: Ticketmaster
best_places_to_buy.description: Authorized ticketing partner for events at Prudential Center, providing a secure platform for purchasing official tickets.

best_places_to_buy.name: StubHub
best_places_to_buy.description: A reliable secondary marketplace for Devils tickets, offering a fanProtect guarantee.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Buying tickets during the mid-week can often be cheaper than weekend games. Group ticket discounts often apply for groups of 10 or more. Some games may have last-minute ticket sales closer to the game day.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Always buy tickets from verified sources to avoid scams. If buying on the secondary market, ensure the website offers buyer guarantee. Avoid buying printed tickets from individuals on site as these can be duplicates or forgeries.
